main.name: Jackson Cai

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Programmer Analyst Intern
work.description:
I am part of the Emerging Technologies and Enterprise Architecture team, where I explore various new technologies within the workplace. 
Here, I was exposed to deploying microservices using Kubernetes and cloud computing using Microsoft Azure. I also had the chance to work with a Data Cloud called Snowflake.

work.title: Junior Developer
work.description: My first industry experience in working with C#, relational databases, and API's. At this internship, I had developed a quality control dashboard that was able to visually present past and present jobs. This dashboard had Microsoft Teams integration and was able to send notifications using POST requests when there was an issue.

work.title: Software Quality Assurance Intern
work.description: Working at this start-up has helped me become agile and adaptive due to the fast pace nature. Here I had got my hands dirty flashing and testing Arduinos to ensure they were working properly and efficiently. I had worked with Python to develop a product identification program that was able to identify QR codes, program hex files into them, and print the QR code.
